reporting-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre

title.narrative: Voluntary medical campaign for open heart surgery and cardiac catheters for adults

description.narrative: Diagnose cases and monitor cases that need treatment. Identify cases requiring surgical intervention or catheters. - The number of open-heart surgeries performed for adults Performing cardiac catheters for adults

Providing medical services to low-income beneficiaries who cannot cover the costs of their treatment. Performing open heart surgeries and cardiac catheters for adults. Eliminate the suffering of many people with heart diseases. Health education for everyone receiving treatment. Provide support to the Ministry of Health, which suffers from a shortage of cardiologists.

participating-org.narrative: International Organization for Relief, Welfare & Development
King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre
